document_data.name: ''Amulet of Spell Warding''
document_data.mainbody: An '''''amulet of spell warding''''' was a type of [[Item enchantment|enchanted]] [[amulet]] that protected the wearer from [[magic]]al [[spell]]s and spell-like abilities. They were favored among [[mage]]s who planned on participating in mage duels.
document_data.Powers: These amulets offered an individual significant protection from magic, in all of its forms. Fortunately for [[spellcaster]]s, they did not interfere with how they practiced [[the Art]], or in the case of [[priest]]s, how they accessed [[the Power]].
document_data.Notable Owners:
*[[Kryll]]: an evil [[necromancer]] who plagued areat to the east from [[Nashkel]] mines in [[1368 DR]].
*[[Xithiss]]: a [[mind flayer]] trader under [[Baeloth Barrityl]]'s control from the [[Black Pits]] of [[Underdark]].
